author: USA TODAY, Grace Hauck, Karl Gelles, Veronica Bravo and Mitchell Thorson, USA TODAY
title: Three months in: A timeline of how COVID-19 has unfolded in the US
description: Here's a look back on how the coronavirus outbreak began, and how it has unfolded in the U.S. so far.
content:
It was three months ago Tuesday that the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced the first confirmed coronavirus case in the U.S.
In the weeks since, health officials have confirmed hundreds of thousands of COVID-19 cases across the nation and t… [+15326 chars]
